name: 引力魔方(Gravity rubik's cube)
description: "Gravity Cube" is a third-person action shooting game. The scene is built in a space where gravity is out of control. Players will play the role of Kylo in the game and complete the tasks of fighting with AI robots in the face of complex and changeable game scenes and constantly changing game mechanisms.My name is Qiao Yuancheng. I am a student in the School of Communication and Information Engineering of Xi 'an University of Science and Technology. I am currently studying Unity in the Virtual Reality Innovation Class of Mr. Liu Jia in the School of Science.This is a game I made in my spare time. It may have a few flaws, but I will keep updating it as I learn Unity.I'd appreciate it if you could share your Unity experience with me.I'm looking forward to using what I've learned to make games better.
